entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:46 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
